properties.entry: SELECT sppd.REAL_QUOTE_PRICE , sppd.REAL_PURCHASE_DATE , ss.NAME FROM sc_purchase_plan_details sppd left join sc_supplier ss on ss.id = sppd.REAL_PROVIDOR WHERE sppd.REAL_QUOTE_PRICE IS NOT NULL AND sppd.SKU = '{@#sku#}'

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( so.purchase_date, "%Y-%m" ) AS P_DATE, srpr.REAL_SKU , SUM(soi.Quantity_Ordered) AS QUANTITY, 'TOTAL' AS TYPE,'' AS ASIN FROM sc_order_item soi , sc_order so ,sc_real_product_rel srpr WHERE soi.Order_ID = so.ORDER_ID AND srpr.SKU = soi.Seller_SKU AND srpr.REAL_SKU = '{@#sku#}' AND so.purchase_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB( DATE_FORMAT( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-01"),"%Y-%m-01 00:00:00"),INTERVAL 12 MONTH) AND NOW() GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( so.purchase_date, "%Y-%m" ) , srpr.REAL_SKU UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT( so.purchase_date, "%Y-%m" ) AS P_DATE, srpr.SKU AS REAL_SKU , SUM(soi.Quantity_Ordered) AS QUANTITY , 'ITEM' AS TYPE,saap.ASIN FROM sc_order_item soi , sc_order so ,sc_real_product_rel srpr ,sc_amazon_account_product saap WHERE soi.Order_ID = so.ORDER_ID AND srpr.SKU = soi.Seller_SKU AND soi.seller_sku = saap.sku AND srpr.REAL_SKU = '{@#sku#}' AND so.purchase_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB( DATE_FORMAT( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-01"),"%Y-%m-01 00:00:00"),INTERVAL 12 MONTH) AND NOW() GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( so.purchase_date, "%Y-%m" ) , srpr.SKU,saap.ASIN

SELECT DAY( so.purchase_date ) AS P_DATE, srpr.REAL_SKU , SUM(soi.Quantity_Ordered) AS QUANTITY, 'TOTAL' AS TYPE,'' AS ASIN FROM sc_order_item soi , sc_order so ,sc_real_product_rel srpr WHERE soi.Order_ID = so.ORDER_ID AND srpr.SKU = soi.Seller_SKU AND srpr.REAL_SKU = '{@#sku#}' AND YEAR(so.purchase_date) = '{@#year#}' AND MONTH(so.PURCHASE_DATE) ='{@#month#}' GROUP BY DAY( so.purchase_date ) , srpr.REAL_SKU UNION ALL SELECT DAY( so.purchase_date ) AS P_DATE, srpr.SKU AS REAL_SKU , SUM(soi.Quantity_Ordered) AS QUANTITY , 'ITEM' AS TYPE,saap.ASIN FROM sc_order_item soi , sc_order so ,sc_real_product_rel srpr ,sc_amazon_account_product saap WHERE soi.Order_ID = so.ORDER_ID AND srpr.SKU = soi.Seller_SKU AND soi.seller_sku = saap.sku AND srpr.REAL_SKU = '{@#sku#}' AND YEAR(so.purchase_date) = '{@#year#}' AND MONTH(so.PURCHASE_DATE) = '{@#month#}' GROUP BY DAY( so.purchase_date ) , srpr.SKU,saap.ASIN
